componentDescription:
Refer to the [Icons](/material-ui/icons/) section of the documentation
regarding the available icon options.

propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.color: The color of the component. It supports both default and custom theme colors, which can be added as shown in the palette customization guide.
propDescriptions.disableFocusRipple: If true, the keyboard focus ripple is disabled.
propDescriptions.disableRipple:
If true, the ripple effect is disabled.
⚠️ Without a ripple there is no styling for :focus-visible by default. Be sure to highlight the element by applying separate styles with the .Mui-focusVisible class.
propDescriptions.edge: If given, uses a negative margin to counteract the padding on one side (this is often helpful for aligning the left or right side of the icon with content above or below, without ruining the border size and shape).
propDescriptions.size: The size of the component. small is equivalent to the dense button styling.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
